sentences.sentence: 没想到我的同桌也来了
sentences.pinyin: méi xiǎng dào wǒ de tóng zhuō yě lái le
sentences.english: I didn't expect my classmate to come too
sentences.japanese: クラスメートも来るとは思いませんでした
sentences.japanese_romaji: kurasumēto mo kuru to wa omoimasen deshita

sentences.sentence: 真没想到你的汉语说得这么流利
sentences.pinyin: zhēn méi xiǎng dào nǐ de hàn yǔ shuō de zhè me liú lì
sentences.korean: 당신의 중국어가 이렇게 유창할 줄 정말 몰랐어요
sentences.english: I really didn't expect your Chinese to be so fluent
sentences.japanese: あなたの中国語がこんなに流暢だとは本当に思いませんでした
sentences.japanese_romaji: anata no chūgokugo ga konna ni ryūchō da to wa hontō ni omoimasen deshita

sentences.pinyin: xiǎng bù dào huì yǒu zhè zhǒng shì
sentences.korean: 이런 일이 있을 줄 생각 못 했어요
sentences.english: I didn't expect this kind of thing to happen
sentences.japanese: こんなことがあるとは思いませんでした
sentences.japanese_romaji: konna koto ga aru to wa omoimasen deshita

sentences.sentence: 我做梦也没想到她会来
sentences.pinyin: wǒ zuò mèng yě méi xiǎng dào tā huì lái
sentences.korean: 꿈에도 그녀가 올 줄 생각 못 했어요

sentences.sentence: 谁也没想到韩国队能进入四强
sentences.pinyin: shéi yě méi xiǎng dào hán guó duì néng jìn rù sì qiáng
sentences.korean: 아무도 한국 팀이 4강에 들 거라고 생각 못 했어요

meaning_and_reading: 날 한, 나라 국, 무리 대

sentences.sentence: 不光长得漂亮了，而且性格也活泼了
sentences.pinyin: bù guāng zhǎng de piào liàng le, ér qiě xìng gé yě huó pō le

sentences.sentence: 坐地铁不光不用担心迟到，而且很便宜

sentences.sentence: 这样做不但省钱，而且省时间
sentences.pinyin: zhè yàng zuò bù dàn shěng qián, ér qiě shěng shí jiān
sentences.korean: 이렇게 하면 돈도 절약하고 시간도 절약해요

sentences.sentence: 他不是不想来，是没有时间

sentences.korean: 그는 오고 싶지 않은 것이 아니라 시간이 없는 거예요

sentences.pinyin: wǒ bù néng bù qù
zhè jiàn shì bù dé bù zuò

sentences.sentence: 要不是你帮忙，我早就放弃了

sentences.sentence: 如果不是下雨，我们就去郊游了
